roleset.name: provide manpower

example.name: all args
example.text: To help residents in Northern California rebuild, FEMA-1 intends to set up 17 disaster assistance offices in the earthquake area in the next several days and *trace*-1 to staff them with 400 to 500 workers from various agencies, said Robert Volland, chief of the agency's individual assistance division.
example.arg: with 400 to 500 workers from various agencies,

example.name: active, worker in subject pos
example.text: To the extent we lack manpower-1 *trace*-1 *trace*-1 to staff menial jobs in hospitals, ...

example.name: passive, worker in demoted subject pos
example.text: [The Sidley-Ashurst venture]-1 will also be staffed *trace*-1 by another Sidley partner specializing in corporate law, a partner from Ashurst concentrating on acquisitions and a Japanese attorney.
example.arg: by another Sidley partner specializing in corporate law, a partner from Ashurst concentrating on acquisitions and a Japanese attorney.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Got to staff all those toll booths .

roleset.note: STAFF-V NOTES: VERY IMPORTANT to distinguish between the staff working and the entitywhich causes those staff to work! Be very careful! (from staff.01-v)
